With OpenDocument Reader you can read and search through your documents in a breeze.

Open and read your ODF file on the go!

OpenDocument Reader allows you to view documents that are stored in OpenDocument format (.odt, .ods, .odp and .odg). These files are usually created using LibreOffice or OpenOffice. This app allows to open such files on your mobile device too, so you can read them on the go.
Found a typo in your document? Now supports modification!
OpenDocument Reader not only allows to read documents on your mobile device, but also supports modifying them too. Typos are fixed in a breeze, even on the train!
Read your documents from within other apps
OpenDocument Reader supports a huge range of other apps to open documents from. A colleague sent a presentation via Gmail? Click the attachment and this app is going to open right away!
Need more space to read? Remove ads for free via the menu.
